channel.title: CVE Feed for Aveva -- PI Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Aveva -- PI Server

item.title: CVE-2023-34348|2024-01-18T17:16:50.038Z -- aveva -- pi%20server
item.description: AVEVA PI Server versions 2023 and 2018 SP3 P05 and prior contain a vulnerability that could allow an unauthenticated user to remotely crash the PI Message Subsystem of a PI Server, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

item.title: CVE-2023-31274|2024-01-18T17:15:25.837Z -- aveva -- pi%20server
item.description: AVEVA PI Server versions 2023 and 2018 SP3 P05 and prior contain a vulnerability that could allow an unauthenticated user to cause the PI Message Subsystem of a PI Server to consume available memory resulting in throttled processing of new PI Data Archive events and a partial denial-of-service condition.
